PAGE1.TITLE: Welocme! Let's get started
PAGE1.DESCRIPTION: If you want to send something enter the pick-up address  or choose a store and create a shopping list.

PAGE2.TITLE: Next Step!
PAGE2.DESCRIPTION: Enter the destination address. Where you want your order to be delivered. Then you pay the specified amount and your order will be forwarded to our Deliverer

PAGE3.TITLE: Tracking
PAGE3.DESCRIPTION: After one of our Deliverers starts your order you can track your order until it is completed.

LOGIN.TITLE: Welcome Back
LOGIN.SUBTITLE: Hello there...
LOGIN.AGREE_TERMS_AND_POLICY: By signing in, you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions
LOGIN.AUTO_FILL_EMAIL_SUBJECT: I'm having trouble signing in to Post Now App

SIGN_UP.TITLE: Welcome Back
SIGN_UP.SUBTITLE: Hello there, sign in to continue!
SIGN_UP.AGREE_TERMS_AND_POLICY: With your registration you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions

INVOICE.TITLE: Invoicing/billing address
INVOICE.ENABLE: Write my address on my invoice/bill
INVOICE.DESCRIPTION: If you activate this option, the address of your choice will be noted on the invoice/bill.

SHOPPING_LIST_MAKER.TEXT_FIELD_HINT: Enter the name of the products you want.
SHOPPING_LIST_MAKER.TITLE: Shopping List
SHOPPING_LIST_MAKER.LEGAL: From the {amount}. product, {price} € will be charged per article.

BACK.CONTENT: Warning! The list will not be saved.

BAR_PAYING_INFO.PART1: The ordered items are to be paid to the Deliverer

MAPS.NO_AVAILABLE_DRIVER_MESSAGE: No available Deliverer in your area.

ACCEPTED.MESSAGE: The Deliverer will take care of your order in shortly.

ON_JOB.STATUS: The deliverer is on the way.

PACKAGE_PICKED.STATUS: Your package is on the way.

SEARCH_DRIVER.STATUS: Wait a moment until a Deliverer accepts the order.

VOUCHER.TITLE: Coupon
VOUCHER.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your coupon of {amount} € was booked as credits.

ERROR.ALREADY_USED: This coupon has already been used.

JOB.ON_ROAD: The Deliverer has accepted your order.
JOB.PACKAGE_PICKED: The Deliverer has picked up the delivery.

CAMERA.TITLE: Allow Post Now to take pictures.
CAMERA.MESSAGE: Post Now needs to access your camera.

LOCATION.TITLE: Allow Post Now to access this device's location.
LOCATION.MESSAGE: In order to be able to show the various stores in your area, we need permission to access your current location.

NOTIFICATION.TITLE: This app would like to send you notifications
NOTIFICATION.MESSAGE: Notifications may include alerts sounds and icon badges.

UPDATE_AVAILABLE.TITLE: New update available.
UPDATE_AVAILABLE.BODY: The latest update must be installed to use the app.

ADDRESS_MANAGER.TITLE: Address data
ADDRESS_MANAGER.I_WILL_COME: I want the Deliverer to come to the door.

ERROR_MESSAGES.HOUSE_NUMBER_IS_NEEDED: The house number must be entered.
ERROR_MESSAGES.DOOR_NUMBER_IS_NEEDED: If you want your delivery to be delivered to the door, please enter the door number.
ERROR_MESSAGES.DOOR_NAME_IS_NEEDED: Enter the name of the person who will receive the delivery.

ARE_YOU_SURE_CANCEL.CONTENT_AFTER_PACKAGE_PICKED: As soon as the deliverer has accepted the order, the amount will not be refunded if the order is canceled.
ARE_YOU_SURE_CANCEL.CONTENT_WITH_AMOUNT: For the cancellation of your order you will be charged {amount} €.
ARE_YOU_SURE_CANCEL.CONTENT: Are you sure you want to cancel?

YOU_CANT_CHANGE.MESSAGE: If you want to change your datas, contact us.

NEED_TYP_ADDRESS.TITLE: Information
NEED_TYP_ADDRESS.CONTENT: For orders of more than {amount} €, we need your full name and address for a correct invoice/bill.
